member.name: M:PoKeysDevice_DLL.PoKeysDevice.PEv2_StartProbing(PoKeysDevice_DLL.sPoKeysPEv2@)
member.summary: Star the probing procedure. ProbeMaxPosition defines the maximum position in position ticks where probing error will be thrown ProbeSpeed defines the probing speed (1 = max speed) ProbeInput defines the extenal input (values 1-8) or PoKeys pin (0-based Pin ID + 9) ProbeInputPolarity defines the polarity of the probe signal

member.name: M:PoKeysDevice_DLL.PoKeysDevice.SetPinData(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.param: Pid ID (0-based)

Pin function byte according to the manual:
bit 0: obsolete
bit 1: digital input
bit 2: digital output
bit 3: analog input
bit 4: analog output
bit 5: triggered input
bit 6: digital counter input
bit 7: invert state

member.name: M:PoKeysDevice_DLL.PoKeysDevice.SetPinData(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Set pin data with counter options
member.param: Pid ID (0-based)

Pin function byte according to the manual:
bit 0: obsolete
bit 1: digital input
bit 2: digital output
bit 3: analog input
bit 4: analog output
bit 5: triggered input
bit 6: digital counter input
bit 7: invert state

Pin counter options according to the manual:
bit 0: count rising edges (fast counter)
bit 1: count falling edges (fast counter)

member.name: M:PoKeysDevice_DLL.PoKeysDevice.GetFullDeviceReport(System.Byte[]@,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Set and read full device report
member.param:
Array of 56 bytes with the following meaning
- bytes 0-3: output data (1-32)
- bytes 4-6: output data (33-55)
- byte 7: analog output MSB
- byte 8: analog output LSB

Array of 56 bytes with the following meaning
- bytes 0-3: input status (1-32)
- bytes 4-6: input status (33-55)
- bytes 7-16: analog 1-5 (MSB+LSB for each input)
- bytes 17-41: 25x 8-bit encoder RAW values
- bytes 42-49: matrix keyboard status (each byte is bit-mapped to a matrix keyboard row)
- bytes 50-53: ultra fast encoder RAW value

param.name: FullReportIn
param.para: - bytes 42-49: matrix keyboard status (each byte is bit-mapped to a matrix keyboard row)
- bytes 50-53: ultra fast encoder RAW value

member.name: F:PoKeysDevice_DLL.sPoKeysDashboardItem.itemType
member.summary:
Dashboard item type
0: unused (inactive)
1: digital input (only display type 0)
2: digital output (only display types 0 and 1)
3: analog input
4: PoExtBus output (only display types 0 and 1) - not yet implemented!!
5: sensor input

member.name: F:PoKeysDevice_DLL.sPoKeysDashboardItem.sensorID
member.summary: ID of the sensor, which value is displayed in this item

summary.para: 1: ON/OFF text value display and on/off buttons
10: analog display in V (voltage in 0.01 V, range -327,68 to +327.67 V)
11: analog display in V with bar graph
13: analog display in mA with bar graph
15: analog display in A with bar graph
20: temperature display in degrees C (temperature in 0.01 C, range 327.68 to +327.67)
21: temperature display in degrees C with bar graph (temperature in 0.01 C, range -100 to 500)
30: relative humidity display in % (humidity in 0.01 % RH)
31: relative humidity display in % with bar graph (humidity in 0.01 % RH)
